AB_TEST_VARIABLE_NAME_VALIDATION_ERROR: It is required to provide a value of at least "A:B:C:D" form while it's suggested to use "DOMAIN:TRIBE:SQUAD:DESCRIPTION". It is required to use ':' characters.
ACTIVATION_VALIDATION_ERROR_TEXT: Empty product groups cannot be activated.
ALERT_COUNTRY_PRODUCT_GROUP_TITLE: Select {{ countryName }} as the country to view this product group.
COPY_PRODUCT_GROUP_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: The Product Group will be copied as new product group, are you sure to COPY it?
DELETE_PRODUCT_GROUP_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: The Product Group will be deleted, are you sure to DELETE it?
DUPLICATE_PRODUCT_IDS: The CSV file contains duplicate Product IDs.
IMAGE_DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete the image?
PRODUCTS_OF_PRODUCT_GROUP_IMPORT_RULES: The selected CSV file's first line should be 'productId', each following line should contain a single product id, and the file should contain at least 1 id.
THERE_IS_NO_PRODUCT_TO_EDIT: There is no product to edit.
